sentences.english: The stipulation of ongoing law is a little fragmentary and omits some necessary provisions.
sentences.chinese: 現行法律的規定略嫌零散，而且存在着盲區。

sentences.english: Photoelectric tracking system with horizontal gimbal can not track objects near zenith.
sentences.chinese: 天頂跟蹤盲區是地平式光電跟蹤系統的固有缺陷。

sentences.english: Frequency adjustable tray rotation speed, to ensure product spray comprehensive, non-blind.
sentences.chinese: 托盤旋轉速度變頻可調，確保產品噴淋全面，無盲區。

sentences.english: Based on these findings, Keller suspects that each person has an olfactory blind spot.
sentences.chinese: 根據這些發現，凱勒推斷，每個人都有一個嗅覺盲區。

sentences.english: We are all blind to our own choice blindness.
sentences.chinese: 其實人人都有選擇盲區。

sentences.english: The method is robust with the variation of distance between two lines, the blind area is considerably decreased.
sentences.chinese: 該方法對線陣間距具有寬容性，並且盲區明顯減小。

sentences.english: It’s a blind spot in their consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 在他們的潛意思裏這是一個盲區。

sentences.english: Secondly, there is a scotoma on spreading them.
sentences.chinese: 二是對孔子仁學思想傳承的研究存在一個盲區。

sentences.english: Automatic, habitual reactions lead us and others into blind alleys.
sentences.chinese: 機械的，習慣性的反應會將我們帶入一個狹窄的盲區。

sentences.english: Handles lateral velocity variations, velocity inversions and blind zones.
sentences.chinese: 處理橫向速度變化，速度倒置和盲區。

sentences.english: Much of structured finance is uncharted territory for litigation.
sentences.chinese: 很多結構性融資都位於訴訟的盲區。

sentences.english: The passive islanding detection methods have large none detection zone.
sentences.chinese: 被動式的孤島檢測方法存在較大孤島檢測盲區。

sentences.english: Still, the law contains significant blind spots.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，這部法律依然存在一些重大盲區。

definition: (abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
lit. pull one hair and the whole body moves/fig. a slight change will affect everything else/the butterfly effect
pinyin: qian1 yi1 fa4 er2 dong4 quan2 shen1

definition: to take the big picture into consideration (idiom)/to work for the benefits of all
